headline: Better Defense Stock: Lockheed Martin vs. Rheinmetall
summary: Military spending around the world is on the rise, but the fastest growth isn't in the U.S., it's in Germany. And Rheinmetall is perhaps the best way to play it.

raw.headline: Better Defense Stock: Lockheed Martin vs. Rheinmetall
raw.summary: Military spending around the world is on the rise, but the fastest growth isn't in the U.S., it's in Germany. And Rheinmetall is perhaps the best way to play it.

headline: Lockheed Martin CEO and CFO to Speak at Citi's 2026 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) Chairman, President and CEO Jim Taiclet and Chief Financial Officer Evan Scott will participate in a fireside chat at Citi's 2026 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference on Wednesday, Feb. 18, from 2:40 to 3:20 p.m. ET.

headline: Trump To Meet Netanyahu Ahead Of Fresh Iran Negotiations: What Does The Prediction Market Say?
summary: Trump hosts Netanyahu for pivotal summit on Middle East stability. High-stakes meeting amid tensions with Iran. Traders skeptical of regime change, defense stocks and oil prices affected.
